events.message: I just received my order but the laptop has a cracked screen and does not turn on properly. I am very disappointed with the quality.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect involving a broken screen and malfunction.
Your case has been assigned to our technical support agent for further assistance regarding the defective product.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop. I’ll do my best to help resolve this problem for you.
Could you please provide photos of the cracked screen and any error messages you see when you try to power it on?
I’ve attached several pictures showing the screen damage and how the laptop fails to boot up. This is unacceptable.
Thank you for the details. We can arrange a replacement unit or offer a full refund. Which option would you prefer?
I would prefer a replacement unit as I need the laptop urgently for work. Please expedite the process.
We've processed the replacement order and it will be shipped to you within two business days at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that it meets your expectations.
Yes, the replacement arrived on time and works perfectly. Thank you for handling the issue so efficiently.
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now but feel free to contact us if you need further assistance.
